flawed_nl_solution:
The trucks cost 60 bottle caps because 10 x 6 = <<10*6=60>>60
He has 20 bottle caps left because 100 - 60 = <<100-60=20>>20
He spends 15 bottle caps on cars because 20 x 0.75 = <<20*0.75=15>>15
He gets 3 cars with this because 15 / 5 = <<15/5=3>>3
He gets 13 vehicles in total because 10 + 3 = <<10+3=13>>13
#### 13

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 40, not 20. It appears there was a miscalculation with the digits before the final zero.
